_sText:
bhop-the-distance, inspired by surf-the-distance. The map contains a bhop track that takes about 4 minutes to complete, with only one checkpoint - At the start! It also includes a bonus, which you will never complete, and even if you do, no one will believe that you did it legit. 
**EDIT:** Nishi just did it, 1st day of release... Well, there goes that "har bonus"...

**Settings:** _Auto, ez, sv-airaccelerate 1337_
